languages.text: Каждое движение и вдох выявляют все новые и новые оттенки непереносимой боли. Вам остается лишь стиснуть зубы и превозмогать, как и положено послушному образцу. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Каждое движение и вдох выявляют все новые и новые оттенки непереносимой боли. Вам остается лишь стиснуть зубы и превозмогать, как и положено послушному образцу. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should.
Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: Jede Bewegung und jeder Atemzug offenbart neue Schattierungen unerträglicher Schmerzen. Du kannst nichts weiter tun, als die Zähne zusammenzubeißen und den Schmerz zu erdulden, wie es jede gehorsame Spezies tun sollte. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Jede Bewegung und jeder Atemzug offenbart neue Schattierungen unerträglicher Schmerzen. Du kannst nichts weiter tun, als die Zähne zusammenzubeißen und den Schmerz zu erdulden, wie es jede gehorsame Spezies tun sollte.

languages.text: Le moindre mouvement, même le simple fait de respirer, vous fait découvrir de nouvelles nuances d'une douleur intolérable. Vous ne pouvez que serrer les dents et tenter de surmonter cette souffrance, comme il se doit d'un spécimen obéissant. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Le moindre mouvement, même le simple fait de respirer, vous fait découvrir de nouvelles nuances d'une douleur intolérable. Vous ne pouvez que serrer les dents et tenter de surmonter cette souffrance, comme il se doit d'un spécimen obéissant.

languages.text: Cada movimiento y aliento revelan nuevos tonos de dolor insufrible. Lo único que puedes hacer es apretar los dientes y superarlo, como todo espécimen obediente. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Cada movimiento y aliento revelan nuevos tonos de dolor insufrible. Lo único que puedes hacer es apretar los dientes y superarlo, como todo espécimen obediente.

languages.text: 動きひとつ、呼吸ひとつで、我慢できないほどの痛みの影が存在を主張する。従順な被験体がするように、歯を食いしばって耐え抜くしかない。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 動きひとつ、呼吸ひとつで、我慢できないほどの痛みの影が存在を主張する。従順な被験体がするように、歯を食いしばって耐え抜くしかない。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 你的每个呼吸，每个动作，都代表着无法忍受的剧痛给你留下的烙印。你唯一能做的就是咬紧牙关，克服痛苦，就像顺从的实验对象该做的那样。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 你的每个呼吸，每个动作，都代表着无法忍受的剧痛给你留下的烙印。你唯一能做的就是咬紧牙关，克服痛苦，就像顺从的实验对象该做的那样。

languages.text: Her hareket ettiğinde ve nefes aldığında yepyeni, dayanılmaz bir acı vücudunu kaplıyor. Yapabileceğin tek şey, uysal bir numune gibi dişini sıkıp acıya direnmek.
languages.original_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Her hareket ettiğinde ve nefes aldığında, yepyeni dayanılmaz bir acı vücudunu kaplıyor. Yapabileceğin tek şey, sadık bir numune gibi dişini sıkıp acıyı yenmek.

languages.text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Can't be removed by normal means.

traits.locale_text: Every movement and breath reveals new shades of intolerable pain. All you can do is grit your teeth and conquer it, as an obedient specimen should. Can't be removed by normal means.
